import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Bar , Line, Pie} from '../../node_modules/react-chartjs-2' const Graph = () => { const [data, setData]= useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ setData({ labels:[ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December' ], datasets:[ { label:"Business Growth Rate", data:[ 123212, 836641, 256172, 152612, 212543, 270000, 533000, 900000, 254343, 152234, 812908, 471208, ], backgroundColor:[ "royalblue", 'red', 'pink', 'orange', 'yellow', 'brown', 'deeppink', 'skyblue', 'cyan', 'blue', 'springgreen', 'purple' ] } ] }) }) return (
) } export default Graph
